data.eml:eml: One new species of the genus Neotriplax (Coleoptera: Erotylidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ren, Jing Li Guo-Dong, Dong, Jian-Zhen (2006): One new species of the genus Neotriplax (Coleoptera: Erotylidae) from China. Zootaxa 1333: 63-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174267
